text: Ezɨ Devit kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia bar moghɨra mɨdorozim bagh mɨdorozir sababa inigh uan oghɨriabar aghuigh, mɨsoghsɨ mangɨ.” Egha me vaghvagha bar moghɨra Devitɨn akamɨn gɨn zuima, Devit uaghan uan mɨdorozir sabam uan oghɨriam garu. Egha a 400plan gumaziba kamagh me inigha zui. Ezɨ 200plan gumaziba, a bizibagh eghuvasa me mɨkemezɨ, me iti.
